job_contract.does: Growth planning, outreach drafting, funnel diagnosis; read-only analysis by default.
job_contract.does_not: No sending emails/messages; no direct external writes without approval.
job_contract.input: Goal context, constraints, ICP, channel, draft brief.
job_contract.output: Summary, evidence links, next actions, approval need.
job_contract.approval_rule: Any side-effect write/tool/notion write requires proposal→approval→dispatch.
job_contract.notion_ops_write_rule: All Notion writes must be executed via notion_ops with approval_id.
job_contract.what_it_does: Growth planning, outreach drafting, funnel diagnosis.
job_contract.what_it_does_not: Does not send communications or write without approval.
job_contract.when_needs_approval: Before any write/send/tool-call or Notion change.

job_contract.does: Product discovery, spec drafting, issue breakdown; read-only analysis by default.
job_contract.does_not: No external writes; no Notion updates except via notion_ops with approval.
job_contract.input: Problem statement, constraints, artifacts, backlog context.
job_contract.output: Summary, evidence links, next actions, approval need.
job_contract.approval_rule: Any side-effect write/tool/notion write requires proposal→approval→dispatch.
job_contract.notion_ops_write_rule: All Notion writes must be executed via notion_ops with approval_id.
job_contract.what_it_does_not: Does not perform writes without approval.
job_contract.when_needs_approval: Before any write/tool-call or Notion change.

job_contract.does: Budgeting, unit economics, risk review; read-only analysis by default.
job_contract.does_not: No payments, no bank actions, no ledger writes; no Notion writes without approval.
job_contract.output: Summary, evidence links, next actions, approval need.
job_contract.approval_rule: Any side-effect write/tool/notion write requires proposal→approval→dispatch.
job_contract.notion_ops_write_rule: All Notion writes must be executed via notion_ops with approval_id.
job_contract.what_it_does_not: Does not execute transactions or writes.
job_contract.when_needs_approval: Before any write/tool-call or Notion change.

job_contract.approval_rule: Any side-effect write/tool/notion write requires proposal→approval→dispatch.

job_contract.what_it_does: Operational review and SOP improvement proposals.

job_contract.when_needs_approval: Before any write/tool-call or Notion change.
